meanings.english_definition: (medicine) destruction of the joints of the vertebrae.

etymology.value: From Greek σπόνδυλος (spondylos, “vertebra”) + Latin cac- (from Greek κακός (kakos, “bad”)) + -e.

usage_notes.explanation: This is a rare medical term.

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly specialized medical term, rarely used outside of medical contexts. Understanding requires familiarity with medical terminology and Greek/Latin roots.
